name: Mark J. Guay, PC
overview:
The law firm of Mark J. Guay, P.C., represents business owners locally, nationally and worldwide in a variety of industries, including e-commerce, marketing, high-technology, and manufacturing. We work with companies in all stages of transformation: startups, turnarounds, exit strategies, accelerated growth, and transformative change.

Our office is conveniently located in downtown Newburyport, Massachusetts. For more than 25 years, we have helped clients to take strategic approaches to their business needs.

MARK J. GUAY, P.C. COUNSELLOR AT LAW 24 CENTER STREET NEWBURYPORT, MA 01950

TELEPHONE: (978) 465-5333 FAX: (978) 499-0074 WEB: www.markjguaypc.com E-MAIL: markguay@verizon.net
